quotes.message: Teamwork makes the dream work, but a vision becomes a nightmare when the leader has a big dream and a bad team.
quotes.name: John C. Maxwell

quotes.message: Teamwork is so important that it is virtually impossible for you to reach the heights of your capabilities or make the money that you want without becoming very good at it.
quotes.name: Brian Tracy

quotes.message: The best teamwork comes from men who are working independently toward one goal in unison.
quotes.name: James Cash Penney

quotes.message: To me, teamwork is the beauty of our sport, where you have five acting as one. You become selfless.
quotes.name: Mike Krzyzewski

quotes.message: Individual commitment to a group effort--that is what makes a team work, a company work, a society work, a civilization work.
quotes.name: Vince Lombardi

quotes.message: Teamwork is the ability to work together toward a common vision. The ability to direct individual accomplishments toward organizational objectives. It is the fuel that allows common people to attain uncommon results.
quotes.name: Andrew Carnegie

quotes.message: Alone we can do so little, together we can do so much.
quotes.name: Helen Keller

quotes.message: Remember, teamwork begins by building trust. And the only way to do that is to overcome our need for invulnerability.
quotes.name: Patrick Lencioni

quotes.message: None of us is as smart as all of us.
quotes.name: Ken Blanchard

quotes.message: Coming together is a beginning. Keeping together is progress. Working together is success.
quotes.name: Henry Ford

quotes.message: If everyone is moving forward together, then success takes care of itself.
quotes.name: Henry Ford

quotes.message: The strength of the team is each individual member. The strength of each member is the team.
quotes.name: Phil Jackson

quotes.message: It takes two flints to make a fire.
quotes.name: Louisa May Alcott

quotes.message: Only by binding together as a single force will we remain strong and unconquerable.
quotes.name: Chris Bradford

quotes.message: Teamwork: I love the idea of all for one especially if that one is me.
quotes.name: Jarod Kintz

quotes.message: You don't win with the best talent - you win with the five players who are able to play well together.
quotes.name: Author Unknown

quotes.message: In union there is strength.
quotes.name: Aesop

quotes.message: Teamwork divides the task and multiplies the success.
quotes.name: Author Unknown

quotes.message: It is a fact that in the right formation, the lifting power of many wings can achieve twice the distance of any bird flying alone.
quotes.name: Author Unknown

quotes.message: Regardless of differences, we strive shoulder to shoulder... [T]eamwork can be summed up in five short words: 'We believe in each other.
quotes.name: Author Unknown

quotes.message: Teamwork: Simply stated, it is less me and more we.
quotes.name: Author Unknown

quotes.message: If everyone is moving forward together, then success takes care of itself.
quotes.name: Henry Ford

quotes.message: A single arrow is easily broken, but not ten in a bundle.
quotes.name: Japanese Proverb

quotes.message: The achievements of an organization are the results of the combined effort of each individual.
quotes.name: Vince Lombardi

quotes.message: People have been known to achieve more as a result of working with others than against them.
quotes.name: Dr. Allan Fromme

quotes.message: Effective teamwork will not take the place of knowing how to do the job or how to manage the work. Poor teamwork, however, can prevent effective final performance. And it can also prevent team members from gaining satisfaction in being a member of a team and the organization.
quotes.name: Robert F. Bales

quotes.message: When a team outgrows individual performance and learns team confidence, excellence becomes a reality.
quotes.name: Joe Paterno

quotes.message: Working together works.
quotes.name: Dr. Rob Gilbert

quotes.message: No one can whistle a symphony. It takes an orchestra to play it.
quotes.name: H.E. Luccock

quotes.message: Teams are not ends in themselves; they are a means by which to achieve other organizational goals.
quotes.name: Richard Wellins

quotes.message: Teamwork represents a set of values that encourage behaviors such as listening and constructively responding to points of view expressed by others, giving others the benefit of the doubt, providing support to those who need it, and recognizing the interests and achievements of others.
quotes.name: Katzenbach & Smith

quotes.message: It is amazing what can be accomplished when nobody cares about who gets the credit.
quotes.name: Robert Yates

quotes.message: The nice thing about teamwork is that you always have others on your side.
quotes.name: Margaret Carty

quotes.message: No man is an island, entire of itself; every man is a piece of the continent.
quotes.name: John Donne

quotes.message: Teamwork appears most effective if each individual helps others to succeed, increasing the synergy of that team; ideally, every person will contribute different skills to increase the efficiency of the team and develop its unity.
quotes.name: Andrew Carnegie

quotes.message: Since the dawn of time, the descent of man has revolved around teamwork, and today, successful organisations in any sphere of life all rely on a teamwork ethic with people working together towards a common goal.
quotes.name: Author Unknown

quotes.message: The way a team plays as a whole determines its success. You may have the greatest bunch of individual stars in the world, but if they don't play together, the club won't be worth a dime.
quotes.name: Babe Ruth, Jr.

quotes.message: No snowflake in an avalanche ever feels responsible.
quotes.name: Stanis_aw Jerzy Lec

quotes.message: Individually we are one drop. Together we are an ocean.
quotes.name: Ryunosuke Satoro

quotes.message: Many hands make light work.
quotes.name: English Proverb

quotes.message: Teamwork makes the dream work.
quotes.name: Bang Gae

quotes.message: If a team is to reach its potential, each player must be willing to subordinate his personal goals to the good of the team.
quotes.name: Bud Wilkinson

quotes.message: Teamwork. A few harmless flakes working together can unleash an avalanche of destruction.
quotes.name: Justin Sewell

quotes.message: Interdependent people combine their own efforts with the efforts of others to achieve their greatest success.
quotes.name: Stephen Covey

quotes.message: Many of us are more capable than some of us, but none of us is as capable as all of us.
quotes.name: Tom Wilson

quotes.message: Sticks in a bundle are unbreakable.
quotes.name: Kenyan Proverb

quotes.message: A boat doesn't go forward if each one is rowing their own way.
quotes.name: Swahili Proverb

quotes.message: A single leaf working alone provides no shade.
quotes.name: Chuck Page
